comment: Fruity on the nose and taste

Açığa yakın sarı
Tatlı -> yeşil elma? Armut?
Yumuşak içimli 
Kısa bitiş
Great floral and vanilla smell but. The taste doesn't exactly match. Still not bad though.

Nose : straight up raisins and that’s it

Palate: little pear, little mint, little salt water, little briny

Finish: soft and bready
Enjoyable, but not really memorable.  Definitely wouldn’t be a daily sipper for me.
Light nose. Little bit of peat
Cinnamon, heat at the end, apple, subdued, probably needed some water to be more enjoyable

Orange peel, honeysuckle and light peat notes
Soft warm mouth feel carries a sweet front into a bounce back and forth between light spicy notes, dry oak and more sweetness. Golden raisin.
Some saltiness in there. A bit of warmth in the chest, the lingering finish is the saltiness in some cardboard.
